billing.question: How does billing work?
billing.answer: We bill annually in advance. You can upgrade at any time with pro-rated billing, and changes take effect immediately.

cancellation.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancellation.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your account will remain active until the end of your current billing period.

support.question: What support do I get?
support.answer: All plans include email support. Professional plans get priority support with faster response times and phone support.
